title: Textile, ca. 1780
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery (chain stitch) on satin weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: White satin with stripe, ornamented with embroidery (chain stitch) in colored silks; design, a bunch of flowers within diagonals of flowers.
